pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint from 0.36.1 to 0.37.0
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.36.1 to 0.37.0.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.37.0

  • Convert module to ECMAScript (breaking change)
    • https://nodejs.org/docs/latest/api/esm.html
    • https://gist.github.com/sindresorhus/a39789f98801d908bbc7ff3ecc99d99c
  • Convert module to named exports (breaking change)
Commits
  • 015b34f Update helpers to version 0.28.0.
  • 62073a8 Update to version 0.37.0.
  • 6e52643 Update CHANGELOG.md for breaking changes, remove outdated comments from test ...
  • 2449163 Add engine-strict=true to .npmrc to catch Node versioning issues with depende...
  • fd7fb92 Bump webpack from 5.97.0 to 5.97.1
  • ce7efbd Update CHANGELOG.md for ESM, add links for guidance.
  • b404c8b Add README documentation for getVersion, leave promise/extendConfig undocumen...
  • 8da43dd Update to use named exports via / /async /promise /sync, simplify references ...
  • e41f034 Bump webpack from 5.96.1 to 5.97.0

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://webpower.eu](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwebpower.eu)
### Comment
> Hi,
> 
> You've reached AdGuard!
> 
> Thank you for this information.
> 
> Can you please fill in this form? https://reports.adguard.com/en/new_issue.html. This way issue goes directly to DNS filter developers.
> 
> Once you've done it, you'll have a link to GitHub for resolution tracking. Share it with us, please üôèÔ∏è
> 
> Let us know if there is anything else & have a wonderful day in the meantime!
> 
> Best,
> AdGuard Support Team üíö
> Werner Van den bosch 
> 2 Dec 2024, 17:03 GMT+3 
> Hello,
>  
> Can you please give me the reason why the domain *.webpower.eu is blocked on your DNS filters ?
>  
> When I try to resolve this domain or do an nslookup I get 0.0.0.0 back from you, on your normal filter DNS ip‚Äôs as well as on your family filter DNS ip‚Äôs. Google, Cloudflare or our provider‚Äôs own DNS resolves this just fine but of course does no filtering.
>  
> What has to be done with your services to have this blocking removed (if it can be of course)
>  
> I am not an employee of webpower.eu but this company is used for marketing and enquete mails as a forwarder so if they are blacklisted or do malicious stuff I need to know so I can either clear it up with them or we switch to a reliable company.
>  
> Many thanks in advance for your support !
>  
> Best Regards,
>  
> Werner Van den bosch
> `wernervandenbosch@telenet.be`
> 
> 
>

Unfortunatly, the site has too few visitors for our [policy](https://adguard.com/kb/ja/general/ad-filtering/filter-policy/). Add
```
2chmeshi.net###block-35
```

to User rules for the Amazon ads and
```
||2chmeshi.net/wp-content/uploads/$subdocument
2chmeshi.net##.widget_block:has(.wp-rss-template-container)
```

for RSS.

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

    • https://nodejs.org/docs/latest/api/esm.html
    • https://gist.github.com/sindresorhus/a39789f98801d908bbc7ff3ecc99d99c
  • Convert module to named exports (breaking change)
Commits
  • 015b34f Update helpers to version 0.28.0.
  • 62073a8 Update to version 0.37.0.
  • 6e52643 Update CHANGELOG.md for breaking changes, remove outdated comments from test ...
  • 2449163 Add engine-strict=true to .npmrc to catch Node versioning issues with depende...
  • fd7fb92 Bump webpack from 5.97.0 to 5.97.1
  • ce7efbd Update CHANGELOG.md for ESM, add links for guidance.
  • b404c8b Add README documentation for getVersion, leave promise/extendConfig undocumen...
  • 8da43dd Update to use named exports via / /async /promise /sync, simplify references ...
  • e41f034 Bump webpack from 5.96.1 to 5.97.0
  • 853c142 Bump eslint from 9.15.0 to 9.16.0
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view
